title: Die Bitteren Tranen Der Petra von Kant (The Bitter Tears of Petr
description:
Also Known As: The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
124 min - Drama - 1972

Director: Rainer Werner Fassbinder
Writers: Rainer Werner Fassbinder (play), Rainer Werner Fassbinder (screenplay)
Stars: Margit Carstensen, Hanna Schygulla and Katrin Schaake
Greek subs included

Petra von Kant is a successful fashion designer -- arrogant, caustic, and self-satisfied. She mistreats Marlene (her secretary, maid, and co-designer). Enter Karin, a 23-year-old beauty who wants to be a model. Petra falls in love with Karin and invites her to move in.
